name: The Quest for the Golden Potato (Definitive)
name_original: The Quest for the Golden Potato (Definitive)
description: This is a definitive version of my game The Quest for the Golden Potato I made in early 2018. Synopsis: This is a tale of a Villager named Darion who is trying to save his village from a mass famine and stop an evil organization from taking over the world with the power of a Golden Potato. What's different between this version and the original? Story is the same;however, it comes with bug fixes and end game content that was accidentally cut from the original version.
